title: Module 3 Quiz: Our Clients & Case Studies

questions.question: What result did Tupperware Australia achieve after working with Overdose?
questions.questionHtml: What result did Tupperware Australia achieve after working with Overdose?

answers.text: Online sales increased by nearly 100% from Q1 to Q2 in under 6 months
answers.textHtml: Online sales increased by nearly 100% from Q1 to Q2 in under 6 months

answers.text: They launched a new product line

questions.feedback: In under 6 months, Tupperware Australia saw online sales increase by nearly 100% from Q1 to Q2 through their new eCommerce website built to complement their traditional party-based sales model.
questions.feedbackHtml: In under 6 months, Tupperware Australia saw online sales increase by nearly 100% from Q1 to Q2 through their new eCommerce website built to complement their traditional party-based sales model.

questions.question: Which industries are considered Overdose's core strengths? (Select all that apply)
questions.questionHtml: Which industries are considered Overdose's core strengths? (Select all that apply)
questions.feedback: Overdose has deep expertise in Fashion & Apparel, Footwear, Beauty & Personal Care, Homewares & Furniture, and Outdoor & Sports. Automotive is not one of our core industry verticals.
questions.feedbackHtml: Overdose has deep expertise in Fashion & Apparel, Footwear, Beauty & Personal Care, Homewares & Furniture, and Outdoor & Sports. Automotive is not one of our core industry verticals.

questions.question: What distinguishes a 'partner' from a 'vendor' in Overdose's philosophy?
questions.questionHtml: What distinguishes a 'partner' from a 'vendor' in Overdose's philosophy?

answers.text: Partners challenge, advise, and share accountability for business outcomes; vendors just execute instructions
answers.textHtml: Partners challenge, advise, and share accountability for business outcomes; vendors just execute instructions

answers.text: Partners charge more money than vendors
Partners sign longer contracts than vendors
Partners have more employees than vendors

questions.feedback: At Overdose, being a partner means challenging briefs, sharing risk, thinking long-term, and being accountable for business outcomes — not just executing what we're told.
questions.feedbackHtml: At Overdose, being a partner means challenging briefs, sharing risk, thinking long-term, and being accountable for business outcomes — not just executing what we're told.

questions.question: What approach did Overdose take with SABA's commerce architecture?
questions.questionHtml: What approach did Overdose take with SABA's commerce architecture?

answers.text: Composable commerce with best-of-breed tools including Commercetools, Algolia, Klaviyo, Omneo, and Comestri
answers.textHtml: Composable commerce with best-of-breed tools including Commercetools, Algolia, Klaviyo, Omneo, and Comestri

answers.text: A simple Shopify store with minimal integrations
answers.textHtml: A simple Shopify store with minimal integrations

questions.feedback: SABA embraced composable commerce with a best-of-breed approach: Commercetools for headless commerce, Algolia for search, Klaviyo for email marketing, Omneo for loyalty, and Comestri for product information management.
questions.feedbackHtml: SABA embraced composable commerce with a best-of-breed approach: Commercetools for headless commerce, Algolia for search, Klaviyo for email marketing, Omneo for loyalty, and Comestri for product information management.

questions.question: What is the #1 reason for returns in the footwear industry?
questions.questionHtml: What is the #1 reason for returns in the footwear industry?
questions.feedback: Size and fit is the #1 reason for returns in footwear. Shoe sizes vary wildly between brands, styles, and even individual lasts, leading to return rates that can exceed 30-40%.
questions.feedbackHtml: Size and fit is the #1 reason for returns in footwear. Shoe sizes vary wildly between brands, styles, and even individual lasts, leading to return rates that can exceed 30-40%.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of ideal Overdose clients?
questions.questionHtml: Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of ideal Overdose clients?

answers.text: Looking for the cheapest possible option

questions.feedback: Clients looking for the cheapest option aren't a good fit for Overdose. Our ideal clients have ambition, an investment mindset, partnership orientation, and complex challenges that require expertise.
questions.feedbackHtml: Clients looking for the cheapest option aren't a good fit for Overdose. Our ideal clients have ambition, an investment mindset, partnership orientation, and complex challenges that require expertise.

questions.question: What does 'consumer empathy' mean in Overdose's partnership philosophy?
questions.questionHtml: What does 'consumer empathy' mean in Overdose's partnership philosophy?

answers.text: Understanding and advocating for our clients' customers as real people with real needs
answers.textHtml: Understanding and advocating for our clients' customers as real people with real needs

answers.text: Responding quickly to customer service inquiries

questions.feedback: Consumer empathy means understanding that our clients' customers are real people with real needs, and advocating for their experience even when it creates short-term challenges for the business.
questions.feedbackHtml: Consumer empathy means understanding that our clients' customers are real people with real needs, and advocating for their experience even when it creates short-term challenges for the business.
